title: No Rewards for People who got banned at the end of the season?
body: I don't get it why do we get this information at the end of the year struggling this whole damn year for nothing.. never got banned in the last 3 4 years and now I get banned at the end of the season really weird isn't it ?? I hope thats a joke riot... what does a ban say to a player in ranked we climbed by ourself up to our division and now we get banned for probably being toxic and thats a reason to not get a reward ??{{champion:238}}

replies.body: I believe the decision was made, essentially, because Riot doesn't want people who consistently put others down and those who are toxic to be rewarded for that type of behavior and gameplay. The announcement was made before 8/22, which gave everyone plenty of notice that any of those punishments or behaviors listed would make them forfeit their rewards.
